ModMetaData.name: Avali
ModMetaData.author: Erisss, FacePlus
ModMetaData.description:
Adds to the game Avali race - race of small fluffy nomadic pack hunters with bad temper and a specific comfort temperature range. <color=orange>Current version: 0.9.3.9 beta</color>
Version for Rim World 1.0: https://mega.nz/#!6I0jFT7S!L2vgOLSEbYM70CGvW4wZX76Fx-Vk510Ovrubo8jmmCo
Description, FAQ, addons, bug reports, mod discussion on Steam page: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1314474881
Requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 ( https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=839005762 ) Load order: Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 -> Avali
C# and XML code by Erisss Graphics by FacePlus Avali race by RyuujinZERO
This mod was based on very early version of that http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1034393407 mod by Jaffer Roshak.
